item.title: How Liberalism Wins
item.description: Democrats do not just need to win more people. They also need to win more places.

item.title: Women Need Workplace Boundaries — Not Remote Work or Flexibility
item.description: Discussion of women in the workplace often focuses on flexible hours, but what’s actually needed is shift work — pioneered by the medical profession.

item.title: War Powers Law Does Not Apply to Trump’s Boat Strikes, Administration Says
item.description: The move deepened the idea that a Vietnam-era law, which says congressionally unauthorized deployments into “hostilities” must end after 60 days, does...

item.title: Death Toll Rises From Hurricane Melissa as Many Communities Remain Cut off
item.description: Authorities have yet to reach dozens of communities in Jamaica, raising the question of how many people really died in last week’s storm.

item.title: An Outlier in Irish Politics Has Become the Country’s President
item.description: Propelled by anti-establishment fervor, Catherine Connolly was elected last week with a landmark popular mandate.
